cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(DFX_SDK_V1.0.5)
#
set_property( GLOBAL APPEND PROPERTY EXTERNAL_INC_DIRS C:/3rdLibary/DFX_SDK_V1.0.5/windows/include )
set_property( GLOBAL APPEND PROPERTY EXTERNAL_LIBS_DIRS C:/3rdLibary/DFX_SDK_V1.0.5/windows/lib )
set_property( GLOBAL APPEND PROPERTY EXTERNAL_LIBS open_cam3d_sdk )
